1.name: Macho Bravo
1.description: NuzMon gain more happiness from a win.

2.name: Feminie Touch
2.description: NuzMon are more likely to join you.

3.name: Easy Target
3.description: More likely to encounter trainers while traveling.

4.name: Senior Discount
4.description: Items are sold to you at a discounted rate.

5.name: Coveted Demographic
5.description: More likely to encounter merchants while traveling.

6.name: Established
6.description: Start the game with more money.

7.name: Trainer's Restraint
7.description: You're able to make your NuzMon deal non-lethal damage during a trainer battle.

8.name: Blood Lust
8.description: All trainer battles are to the death.

9.name: Green Thumb
9.description: Increased effectiveness of Plant type NuzMon.

10.name: Pyromaniac
10.description: Increased effectiveness of Fire type NuzMon.

11.desciption: Increased effectiveness of Water type NuzMon.

12.name: Normie
12.desciption: Increased effectiveness of Basic type NuzMon.
